original_title: Monsters of the Wild: Wonderfully Weird
overview: Mother Nature...creator of breathtaking beauty. And it seems there’s no end to her evolutionary inspirations…or perhaps? Twisted imagination. From unexpected killing machines and freaky fliers to cheeky masters of disguise. Welcome to the wonderfully weird world of creatures so bizarre…so frightening…and so strange that sometimes, they even scare each other.
title: Monsters of the Wild: Wonderfully Weird
